breeds.name: LaPerm
breeds.temperament: Affectionate, Friendly, Gentle, Intelligent, Playful, Quiet
breeds.description: LaPerms are gentle and affectionate but also very active. Unlike many active breeds, the LaPerm is also quite content to be a lap cat. The LaPerm will often follow your lead; that is, if they are busy playing and you decide to sit and relax, simply pick up your LaPerm and sit down with it, and it will stay in your lap, devouring the attention you give it.

breeds.name: Korat
breeds.temperament: Active, Loyal, highly intelligent, Expressive, Trainable
breeds.description: The Korat is a natural breed, and one of the oldest stable cat breeds. They are highly intelligent and confident cats that can be fearless, although they are startled by loud sounds and sudden movements. Korats form strong bonds with their people and like to cuddle and stay nearby.
